text: Orlando Bloom had the hots for Cate Blanchett when they filmed The Lord of the Rings together 19 years ago. Bloom, 41, confessed his pining for the Aussie starlet during their appearance on Monday night's episode of The Late Late Show. Host James Corden asked Bloom what his first impression of his co - star was during filming. ` ` I had such a crush,'' Bloom said. ` ` Well, [ LOTR character ] Legolas has a crush, and then I had the biggest crush on you.'' ` ` I had no idea,'' said Blanchett, shocked. ` ` This is actually a dating show, isn't it?''
